Normal.Title: Explanation
Normal.Details: Magnetic field measuring technology is widely used because of earth magnetic field and ferromagnetic properties of steel used as construction material. Typical application areas are geoscience, exploration of mineral resources and buried materials, and satellite and military areas.

Satellite.Title: Explanation
Details: Light mass and low power consumption designed for satellite.
Attitude sensing using 3-axis components of earth magnetic field

Defense.Title: Explanation
Details: Products are specially useful for under see water to measure magnetic field of warship
3-axis have high orthogonality each other and high linearity
Total field measurement overcome magnetometer attitude change.

Satellite.Title: Explanation
Details: Torque generation using magnetic dipole moment and earth magnetic field to rotate satellite
Light mass and low power consumption designed for satellite.
Magnetic materials testing equipment to measure AC and DC hysteresis loop, core loss, and magnetostriction.
Measure dc hysteresis loop of soft magnetic material
Toroidal and single strip specimen are possible
Measure ac hysteresis loop of soft magnetic material
Epstein and single strip specimen are possible
